attributes.action: Let England have its own office - the same as the other three UK Countries
attributes.additional_details: Northern Ireland, Scotland and Wales each have their own "office". England is a part of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland as well... Why can England not have its own office? Just the same as why can England not have its own official national anthem and why is it less common to see the English Flag flown as opposed to the British, Union Flag? Make England, England!!
